title: few fonts
content: Wich fonts are in this animation [http://www.orgiecs.org/orgie.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202151635/http:/www.orgiecs.org/orgie.gif "http://www.orgiecs.org/orgie.gif") ?
author: Iulyy

comments.content:
I see a free font in there that's based on the Mountain Dew logo. I don't know what it's called though. The real font that it's based on is Serpentine.

- Lex
